ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Closure Code field, when a "Closed" Status value is chosen.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(Closure_Code__c, '')), ( ( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Communicated Findings to Client') ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - Field to Relay Findings to Client') ) || ( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closed in PAC - No Communication Necessary') ) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must select a Closure Code value when choosing a "Closed" Status value.
